# init(addPassButtonStyle:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new Add Pass button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(addPassButtonStyle style: PKAddPassButtonStyle)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: The buttonâ€™s style. For a complete list of styles, see [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPassButtonStyle].

## Return Value

Returns a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPassButton] instance with the specified style.
